name: GEM_ERP_EX_LastMedicationDispense
title: Last Medication Dispense
description: This extension should be used in the Task ressource. It shows the timestamp of the last dispense.

element.short: Timestamp which is set when a medication for this task has been dispensed. Stated in the format YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS(Z|±HH:MM)
element.definition: This field allows the E-Rezept-FdV to display to the user that a medication has been dispensed before it was closed by the pharmacy.

element.short: Timestamp which is set when a medication for this task has been dispensed.
